methods.name: public Builder setType(@SafetySourceGroupType int type)
methods.comment:
* Sets the type of this safety sources group. * *

If the type is not explicitly set, the type is inferred according to the state of * certain fields. If no title is provided when building the group, the group is of type * hidden. If a title is provided but no summary or stateless icon are provided when * building the group, the group is of type stateless. Otherwise, the group is of type * stateful.

methods.name: public Builder setId(@Nullable String id)
methods.comment:
* Sets the id of this safety sources group. * *

The id must be unique among safety sources groups in a Safety Center configuration.

methods.name: public Builder setTitleResId(@StringRes int titleResId)
methods.comment:
* Sets the resource id of the title of this safety sources group. * *

The id must refer to a string resource that is either accessible from any resource * context or that is accessible from the same resource context that was used to load the * Safety Center configuration. The id defaults to {@link Resources#ID_NULL} when a title is * not provided. A title is required unless the group only contains safety sources of type * issue only.

methods.name: public Builder setSummaryResId(@StringRes int summaryResId)
methods.comment:
* Sets the resource id of the summary of this safety sources group. * *

The id must refer to a string resource that is either accessible from any resource * context or that is accessible from the same resource context that was used to load the * Safety Center configuration. The id defaults to {@link Resources#ID_NULL} when a summary * is not provided.

methods.name: public Builder setStatelessIconType(@StatelessIconType int statelessIconType)
methods.comment:
* Sets the stateless icon type of this safety sources group. * *

If set to a value other than {@link SafetySourcesGroup#STATELESS_ICON_TYPE_NONE}, the * icon specified will be displayed for collapsible groups when all the sources contained in * the group are stateless.

methods.name: public Builder addSafetySource(@NonNull SafetySource safetySource)
methods.comment:
* Adds a {@link SafetySource} to this safety sources group. * *

A safety sources group must contain at least one {@link SafetySource}.

methods.name: public SafetySourcesGroup build()
methods.comment:
* Creates the {@link SafetySourcesGroup} defined by this {@link Builder}.
         *
         * @throws IllegalStateException if any constraint on the safety sources group is violated
